message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we can both benefit. This is a good deal for you in the early rounds.
Let's be practical, Alice. The value diminishes rapidly for you. This is a fair offer considering the time constraint.
Bob, you're pushing it. I'm being very generous, but I won't let you walk all over me. Let's make a deal.
Alice, time is running out.  This offer benefits us both.  Let's be sensible and close this deal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a very fair deal.  Take it before the clock runs out on both of us!
Alice, I'm being more than fair. The clock is ticking and your share is shrinking.  Let's settle this now.
Bob, it's time to get serious.  This offer is the best you'll get.  Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
Alice, let's be realistic.  This is a good deal for both of us at this stage. Don't let time erode your share any further.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.  You're running out of time and options!
